attributes.action: Stop Emma and Patch destroying our beautiful world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is aimed at ridding the world from the evil CFC producing Jack Russel Terrier known as "Patch".

Patch releases no less than 300,000 to 400,000 cubic meters of 100% pure CFC gasses per day and is thought to be solely repsonsible for more than 70% of the current Environmental issues the world is facing.

Patch has also been widely rumoured to be a very close associate of the now infamous Emma "the" Lindsey, who over the past 4-6 months has became notorious for her inability to dispose of items in the correct manner, even when a purposefulyl sited bin stands no less than 8 feet from her.

Unconfirmed rumours also say the 2 were responsible for Hurricane Katrina and the Asian tsunami, which together killed over 100 billion innocent human beings.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
